original: 江夏安陸人。曾遭黨錮之禍被禁錮二十餘年。董卓亂政時，和司徒王允共謀誅殺董卓。李傕、郭汜攻破長安後，黃琬因此入獄，死於獄中。
text: Jiangxia Anlu people. He was imprisoned by the party for more than 20 years. When Dong Zhuo was in trouble, he and Situ Wang Yun conspired to kill Dong Zhuo. After Li Zhang and Guo Bin attacked Chang'an, Huang Wan was imprisoned and died in prison.
